name: fake-data-generator
title: Fake Data Generator
description: This extension generates realistic fake data for testing purposes, including French social security numbers (based on a provided birth date) and IBANs. Ideal for developers and testers needing valid-looking data for their projects.
author: Jaji

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
